Lyrics: Hﾃｩlas madame, celle que j・E・Eayme tant:
Poetic Translation: "Alas, my lady, you whom I adore:

Lyrics: Souffrez que soye vostre humble servant;
Poetic Translation: Make me your humble, servant, I implore:

Lyrics: vostre humble servant je seray a toujours
Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: Your true and humbel servant I will always be,

Lyrics: Et tant que je viv・E・Eay ault・E・E n・E・Eaymeray que vous.
Poetic Translation: And every day I live, I'll love you loyally."

Lyrics: Hﾃｩlas, beau sire, vous estez bel et bon,
Poetic Translation: "Alas, good sir, you are so good and kind,

Lyrics: Sage et courtoys et de noble maison.
Poetic Translation: As nobly born as anyone could find,

Lyrics: Et aussi bon que l・E・Eon scairoit finer,
Poetic Translation: As courteous and wise as any I have met,

Lyrics: Mais cil que j・E・Eayme, ne scairoye oublier,
Poetic Translation: But the man I love I never can forget."

Lyrics: Hﾃｩlas, madame, pences en vostre cas:
Poetic Translation: "Alas, my lady, think about your choice:

Lyrics: Entre nous deulx ne fault point d・E・Eavocatz.
Poetic Translation: We need between us no one else's voice."

Lyrics: Certes non pas, et vous le scavez bien.
Poetic Translation: "I certainly will not; it's useless, as you know.

Lyrics: Allez vous en, car vous ne faictez rien.
Poetic Translation: You won't succeed, so now away you go!"

Lyrics: Mon coeur souspire et se plaint tendrement,
Poetic Translation: "My heart complains and sighs with tender grief

Lyrics: Quant il ne peult trouver allegement.
Poetic Translation: Because your answer gives me no relief.

Lyrics: Ne scay comment on me veult dechasser;
Poetic Translation: Should I pursue the hunt? Should I give up the chase?

Lyrics: S・E・Eil est ainsi, j・E・Eayray ailleurs chasser.
Poetic Translation: If you refuse, I'll search some other place."

Lyrics: Hﾃｩlas, madame, et n・E・Een seray-je point?
Poetic Translation: "Alas, my lady, must my love lie died?"

Lyrics: Certes beau sire, je ne le vous dis point.
Poetic Translation: "Oh no, good sir, that isn't what I said:

Lyrics: Servez a point: il vous sera mery.
Poetic Translation: For service is repaid if well you play your part."

Lyrics: Hﾃｩlas madame, de bon coeur vous mercy.
Poetic Translation: Alas, my lady, thank you from my heart."

Lyrics: Henry VIII, King of England
Poetic Translation: Carol Anne Perry Lagemann
